segments.text: I see the boy balancing on that stool, and it’s making me so nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s really stretching to reach those cookies, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall—it would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is already wet, so if he slips, it’ll be even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just drying that plate, completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to warn them before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just waiting for something bad to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they would just ask for the cookies instead of sneaking them.
segments.speaker: PAR
